provisioningState.description: The provisioned state of the resource.

enableDiskEncryption.description: A boolean value that indicates if the cluster's disks are encrypted.

enableStreamingIngest.description: A boolean value that indicates if the streaming ingest is enabled.

ClusterProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto cluster properties.

TrustedExternalTenant.description: Represents a tenant ID that is trusted by the cluster.

capacity.description: The number of instances of the cluster.

default.description: The default capacity that would be used.

SkuDescriptionList.description: The list of the EngagementFabric SKU descriptions

locations.description: The set of locations that the SKU is available

restrictions.description: The restrictions because of which SKU cannot be used

location.description: The available location of the SKU.

zones.description: The available zone of the SKU.

capacity.description: The number of instances of the cluster.

Zones.description: An array represents the availability zones of the cluster.

version.description: The version of the template defined, for instance 1.

isEnabled.description: A boolean value that indicate if the optimized autoscale feature is enabled or not.

OptimizedAutoscale.description: A class that contains the optimized auto scale definition.

enginePublicIpId.description: Engine service's public IP address resource id.

dataManagementPublicIpId.description: Data management's service public IP address resource id.

VirtualNetworkConfiguration.description: A class that contains virtual network definition.

size.description: The database size - the total size of compressed data and index in bytes.

DatabaseStatistics.description: A class that contains database statistics information.

provisioningState.description: The provisioned state of the resource.

softDeletePeriod.description: The time the data should be kept before it stops being accessible to queries in TimeSpan.

hotCachePeriod.description: The time the data should be kept in cache for fast queries in TimeSpan.

DatabaseProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto database properties.

nameAvailable.description: Specifies a Boolean value that indicates if the name is available.

value.description: The collection of available SKUs for an existing resource.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for displaying in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

OperationListResult.title: Result of the request to list REST API operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL nextLink to get the next set of results.

value.title: The list of operations supported by the resource provider.

nextLink.title: The URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

display.title: The object that describes the operation.

provider.title: Friendly name of the resource provider.

resource.title: The resource type on which the operation is performed.

description.title: The friendly name of the operation.

origin.title: The intended executor of the operation.
